titlestmt.titleproper: Mary Edsall Choquette collection of dance conference materials 2001-2003
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Mary Edsall Choquette collection of dance conference materials

bioghist.p: Mary Edsall was the curator of the Temple Dance Collection from 2000 to 2005. She received a B.A. in Arts / Dance from Richard Stockton College in 1987 and a M.A. in Dance and Dance Education from Columbia University in 1991. In 2003, Edsell was chair of the Congress on Research in Dance (CORD) conference committee.

scopecontent.p: This is collection of materials related to conferences in which Mary Edsall participated. Organizations sponsoring the conventions include Dance USA, the Society of Dance History Scholars, the World Dance Alliance, and the Congress on Research in Dance (CORD). Materials include proposals, abstracts, and review comments for papers to be presented at the CORD 2003 conference; and programs, brochures, and schedules. The collection also includes digital recordings of the plenary and awards sessions of the CORD 2001 conference.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
